subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Unseeded Camille Pin of France upset seventh-seeded Ekaterina Makarova of Russia, 6-2, 6-0, in the first round of the Cincinnati Open. Pin, who is ranked 78th on the WTA Tour, said she focused on keeping the 57th-ranked Makarova off-balance by changing tempo. Fourth-seeded Katarina Srebotnik of Slovenia defeated Amanda Fink of the United States, 6-3, 6-3.
